scripts.vercel-build: yum install cairo-devel libjpeg-turbo-devel giflib-devel pango-devel -y && cp /lib64/{libpng12.so.0,libjpeg.so.62,libpixman-1.so.0,libfreetype.so.6,libcairo.so.2,libpango-1.0.so.0,libpangocairo-1.0.so.0,libpangoft2-1.0.so.0} lib/ && yum install libuuid-devel libmount-devel && cp /lib64/{libuuid,libmount,libblkid}.so.1 node_modules/canvas/build/Release/ && npm run build
